snippet: Chris Stevens arrived back in Tripoli in May as the U.S. ambassador. In July, he e-mailed friends to give his first impressions about the country after the fall of Muammar al-Qaddafi and his hopes for the future.
abstract: Chris Stevens arrived back in Tripoli in May as the U.S. ambassador. In July, he e-mailed friends to give his first impressions about the country after the fall of Muammar al-Qaddafi and his hopes for the future.

headline.main: In Letter to Friends, Slain U.S. Ambassador Expressed Hope
